coreAtributes.name: Gorget
coreAtributes.description: A metal plate that encompasses the throat, collar, and upper chest, to protect your neck from physical assault.

displacementText.playerSelf: You open the Gorget, and remove it from your neck.
displacementText.playerNPC: You open [npc.name]'s Gorget, and remove it from their neck.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You wrench on the Gorget, tearing it from [npc.name]'s neck.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.name] opens the Gorget, and removes it from their neck.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.name] opens the Gorget, and removes it from your neck.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.name] wrenches on the Gorget, tearing it from your neck.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.name] opens the Gorget, and removes it from [npc2.name]'s neck.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.name] wrenches on the Gorget, tearing it from [npc2.name]'s neck.

replacementText.playerSelf: You close the Gorget around your neck.
replacementText.playerNPC: You close the Gorget around [npc.name]'s neck.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hastily slap the Gorget around [npc.name]'s neck.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.name] closes the Gorget around their neck.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.name] closes the Gorget around your neck.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.name] hastily slaps the Gorget around your neck.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.name] hastily slaps the Gorget around [npc2.name]'s neck.
